likelihood_impact_change.explanation: Under the 'Delayed Transition' scenario, biodiversity loss is projected to increase, coupled with ecosystem degradation. This will likely exacerbate the depletion of raw materials essential for iPhone production, increasing both the likelihood and impact of resource availability issues.

emerging_opportunities.description: Developing and marketing iPhones that utilize sustainably sourced or recycled materials could attract environmentally conscious consumers.

additional_challenges.description: Increased biodiversity loss may disrupt supply chains for critical components, leading to production delays and increased costs.

mitigation_strategies.description: Expand the supplier base to include vendors that prioritize sustainable practices and biodiversity conservation.

mitigation_strategies.strategy: Investment in R&D for Alternative Materials
mitigation_strategies.description: Invest in research and development to identify alternative materials that can replace those at risk due to biodiversity loss.
